exceptions.exn: In environment b : nat Hb : b > 0 a : nat Unable to unify "let (q, r) := Z.div_eucl ?M1421 ?M1422 in ?M1421 = (?M1422 * q + r)%Z /\\ (0 <= r < ?M1422)%Z" with "Z.of_nat a = Z.of_nat (fst (a / b, a mod b) * b + snd (a / b, a mod b))".

original: intros b Hb a. exists (a / b, a mod b). split. - apply chRem3. apply Z_div_mod. apply Hb. - apply Z_div_mod. apply Hb.
